Actions.Name: Add rows to a dataset
Actions.Description: Use Power BI REST API to add rows to a dataset.

Actions.Name: When a data driven alert is triggered
Actions.Description: Return the details of the specified data driven alert from Power BI when the alert triggered.

Actions.Name: Create a goal (Preview)
Actions.Description: Creates a goal on the specified scorecard.

Actions.Name: Create a scorecard (Preview)
Actions.Description: Creates a Scorecard for Power BI Goals.

Actions.Name: Get a goal (Preview)
Actions.Description: Gets the specified goal on a scorecard.

Actions.Name: Get a goal check-in (Preview)
Actions.Description: Get a check-in on a goal.

Actions.Name: Get goal check-ins (Preview)
Actions.Description: Get all check-ins on a goal.

Actions.Name: Get multiple goals (Preview)
Actions.Description: Get a list of goals in the specified scorecard.

Actions.Name: When a property of some goal changes (Preview)
Actions.Description: When a property of some goal changes.

Actions.Name: When data refresh for a goal fails (Preview)
Actions.Description: When data refresh for a goal fails.

Actions.Name: When new or existing goals get assigned owners (Preview)
Actions.Description: When new or existing goals get assigned owners.

Actions.Name: Create a goal check-in (Preview)
Actions.Description: Creates a Power BI goal check-in.

Actions.Name: Add a note to a goal check-in (Preview)
Actions.Description: Appends a new note to a check-in of a Power BI goal.

Actions.Name: When a goal check-in or note is added or modified (Preview)
Actions.Description: Trigger for some goal check-in or note changes.

Actions.Name: Export To File for Paginated Reports
Actions.Description: Use Power BI Rest API to inititate export for paginated reports

Actions.Name: Export To File for Power BI Reports
Actions.Description: Use Power BI Rest API to inititate export for Power BI reports

Actions.Name: Power BI button clicked
Actions.Description: This trigger allows you to run a flow when a Power BI button is clicked. (Available only for Power Automate.)

Actions.Name: Refresh a dataset
Actions.Description: Use Power BI REST API to refresh a powerbi dataset.

Actions.Description: Updates the goal's state.

Actions.Description: Updates a Power BI goal check-in.
